SEEALSO: ORMEvictEntity, ORMEvictQueries, Evict content from secondary cache in Developing ColdFusion Applications
DESCRIPTION: This method is used to evict all the collection or association data for the given entity name and collection name, from the secondary cache. If the primary key is specified, then, the collection or association data of the entity with the primary key is evicted.
EXAMPLE:
To evict all the association or collection data of collection arts belonging to the component CArtists:
<cfset ORMEvictCollection("CArtists", "arts")>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Entity name of the persistent CFC.
Name of the collection in the component
Primary key of the collection or association data of the entity
